entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403202}Anyone who comes of age at 18 must{F801}undergo the ceremony at Mikado Castle.{F801}{F802}I was born and raised here, so it was{F801}a short trip for me. But it must be a{F801}chore for those who live very far away.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403202}Anyone who comes of age at 18 must{F801}undergo the ceremony at Mikado Castle.{F801}{F802}I was born and raised here, so it was{F801}a short trip for me. But it must be a{F801}chore for those who live very far away.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403241}Most of the youths who were here for{F801}the ceremony have gone back to their{F801}hometowns.{F801}{F802}But I think I saw a few of them staying{F801}around Mikado Castle for a few days{F801}before the return trip.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403241}Most of the youths who were here for{F801}the ceremony have gone back to their{F801}hometowns.{F801}{F802}But I think I saw a few of them staying{F801}around Mikado Castle for a few days{F801}before the return trip.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}I would like to take my son to work{F801}with me sometime soon so he can start{F801}to learn my trade...{F801}{F802}But he spends all his time in something{F801}called a "Sabbath" in another village.{F801}I rarely see him until the next morning.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}I would like to take my son to work{F801}with me sometime soon so he can start{F801}to learn my trade...{F801}{F802}But he spends all his time in something{F801}called a "Sabbath" in another village.{F801}I rarely see him until the next morning.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403213}The Black Samurai said that people became{F801}demons by reading Literature, right?{F801}{F802}You can't be serious... I have friends{F801}who've been reading that stuff...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403213}The Black Samurai said that people became{F801}demons by reading Literature, right?{F801}{F802}You can't be serious... I have friends{F801}who've been reading that stuff...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}I used to have a son. But he became{F801}engrossed in Sabbaths and refused to{F801}work.{F801}{F802}So he will be among those in the next{F801}public execution, as he is no longer{F801}a contributing member of society.{F801}{F802}As expiation for my failures as a{F801}father, I'll raise this adopted son{F801}in his place.{F801}

But he became{F801}engrossed in Sabbaths and refused to{F801}work.{F801}{F802}So he will be among those in the next{F801}public execution, as he is no longer{F801}a contributing member of society.{F801}{F802}As expiation for my failures as a{F801}father, I'll raise this adopted son{F801}in his place.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}I once had a son. He refused to work{F801}and spend all of his time attending{F801}Sabbaths.{F801}{F802}So I had him executed. He was no longer{F801}a contributing member of society.{F801}{F802}As expiation for my failures as a{F801}father, I'll raise this adopted son{F801}in his place.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}If you become a Blessed Samurai, you'll{F801}be counted as a Luxuror too! What a{F801}boon that must be!{F801}{F802}Though I'm satisfied being a Casualry,{F801}myself. It's the station in life God{F801}has given me.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}If you become a Blessed Samurai, you'll{F801}be counted as a Luxuror too! What a{F801}boon that must be!{F801}{F802}Though I'm satisfied being a Casualry,{F801}myself. It's the station in life God{F801}has given me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}Oh, what a young Blessed Samurai you are.{F801}Are you on holiday today?{F801}{F802}Do you know the bakery in the castle{F801}town? It's quite popular...{F801}{F802}Even Luxurors come down to buy the{F801}bread there.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403303}Oh, what a young Blessed Samurai you are.{F801}Are you on holiday today?{F801}{F802}Do you know the bakery in the castle{F801}town? It's quite popular...{F801}{F802}Even Luxurors come down to buy the{F801}bread there.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403341}That bakery always smells so good.{F801}{F802}Just yesterday, I was telling a boy{F801}from outside the village about it...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403341}That bakery always smells so good.{F801}{F802}Just yesterday, I was telling a boy{F801}from outside the village about it...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}The baker seems to do a brisk business.{F801}He even gets customers from other{F801}villages.{F801}{F802}Until now, no one had ever considered{F801}shopping outside their hometown...{F801}{F802}I suppose it's because of those{F801}Sabbaths. I see a lot of people come{F801}and go these days.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}Black Samurai said that God bore us{F801}no love...{F801}{F802}Does she mean that there is no God?{F801}Then who assigned our roles?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}Black Samurai said that God bore us{F801}no love...{F801}{F802}But that was utter bilge. Of course{F801}God exists!{F801}{F802}Why, our new leader called herself a{F801}messenger from God, didn't she?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403302}I've actually never met the new leader{F801}in the flesh.{F801}{F802}But you can tell from all the wise{F801}words that come to us from the{F801}Monastery...{F801}{F802}She really is a messenger of God.{F801}She knows everything happening in{F801}this kingdom.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403321}I've actually never met the new leader{F801}in the flesh.{F801}{F802}There's a thought that gives me shivers.{F801}We blindly put our trust in someone{F801}we'd never once met.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Talkative woman\0{F87A,36}{F813,1,403321}I've actually never met the new leader{F801}in the flesh.{F801}{F802}There's a thought that gives me shivers.{F801}We blindly put our trust in someone{F801}we'd never once met.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}Today's that ceremony, right? That means{F801}there'll be a whole mob of people coming{F801}to Mikado Castle...{F801}{F802}I'd best pick up the pace on my work,{F801}shouldn't I?{F801}{F802}Ah well. I'm not paid to use my brain.{F801}The Luxurors can do the thinking for me.{F801}

That means{F801}there'll be a whole mob of people coming{F801}to Mikado Castle...{F801}{F802}I'd best pick up the pace on my work,{F801}shouldn't I?{F801}{F802}Ah well. I'm not paid to use my brain.{F801}The Luxurors can do the thinking for me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}I saw a group of Blessed Samurai this{F801}morning. Were they departing on some{F801}mission?{F801}{F802}And if they are, should I pick up the{F801}pace on my work?{F801}{F802}Ah well. I'm not paid to use my brain.{F801}The Luxurors can do the thinking for me.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}I heard tell there was an expedition to{F801}Kiccigiorgi. Is that right?{F801}{F802}That peaceful burg is far from any{F801}strife. Why go there?{F801}{F802}Oh, how the question torments me...{F801}But the Luxurors will solve it for{F801}us, so there's no sense worrying.{F801}

The Luxurors will tell me if{F801}it's necessary, I suppose.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}I hear that the Blessed Samurai will{F801}continue to go on more expeditions...{F801}{F802}I was asked to pick up the pace to{F801}satisfy the higher demand.{F801}{F802}Our new leader is so resourceful! She{F801}makes her decisions before I can even{F801}bring her the question.{F801}

She{F801}makes her decisions before I can even{F801}bring her the question.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}The Blessed Samurai are still going{F801}willy-nilly over the land.{F801}{F802}So I'll be picking up the pace, as our{F801}new leader has ordered.{F801}{F802}Since we're about to usher in the new{F801}millennium, we tradesmen of the kingdom{F801}must join forces and work harder.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}The Blessed Samurai are still going{F801}willy-nilly over the land.{F801}{F802}So I'll be picking up the pace, as our{F801}new leader has ordered.{F801}{F802}Since we're about to usher in the new{F801}millennium, we tradesmen of the kingdom{F801}must join forces and work harder.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}The Blessed Samurai are still going{F801}willy-nilly over the land...{F801}{F802}They've a tough road to hoe. I must pick{F801}up the pace of my work to do my part.{F801}{F802}After all, we're emigrating to a new{F801}land, yes? So we tradesmen of the kingdom{F801}must join forces and work harder.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-424}{F813,1,412001}This is a red pill I got in Tokyo.{F801}The choice is yours. Eat it and join{F801}us in demonhood...{F801}{F802}Or stay human--a slave to God--and end{F801}your miserable life here. Choose now.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-424}{F813,1,412001}This is a red pill I got in Tokyo.{F801}The choice is yours. Eat it and join{F801}us in demonhood...{F801}{F802}Or stay human--a slave to God--and end{F801}your miserable life here. Choose now.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403203}They'll be letting us Casualries into{F801}Mikado Castle today.{F801}{F802}The Monastery has summoned us all to{F801}Obelisk Plaza this morning...{F801}{F802}They said it would be a holiday from{F801}work, but I ask you, what is more{F801}important in this world than work?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Innocent man\0{F87A,34}{F813,1,403213}My son is so engrossed in Sabbaths{F801}that he's not willing to learn an{F801}honest trade...{F801}{F802}So I've decided to take this boy into{F801}my home. He's an orphan who lost his{F801}parents in Cheoda to demons.{F801}{F802}According to what I've read, this sort{F801}of thing is called "adoption."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}These days, the Blessed Samurai are{F801}dispatched all across the kingdom.{F801}{F802}I think that I should pick up my pace{F801}to fulfill the expected need...{F801}{F802}But I can't be sure. I'll let the{F801}Luxurors decide...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Craftsman\0{F87A,35}{F813,1,403242}The Blessed Samurai are needed for more{F801}expeditions than before, I suppose...{F801}{F802}Perhaps I should pick up the pace to{F801}satisfy the higher demand...?{F801}{F802}Ah well, it's not for me to decide.{F801}That's the Luxurors' job.{F801}
